mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follows (FOLLOWER_ID, FOLLOWING_ID, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{followerId}, #{followingId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follows WHERE FOLLOWER_ID = #{followerId} AND FOLLOWING_ID = #{followingId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows WHERE FOLLOWER_ID = #{followerId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows WHERE FOLLOWING_ID = #{followingId}
SELECT u.ID AS followerId, u.USERNAME AS followerUsername, u.PROFILE_PICTURE AS followerProfilePicture FROM follow f INNER JOIN users u ON f.FOLLOWER_ID = u.ID WHERE f.FOLLOWING_ID = #{userId}
SELECT u.id AS followingId, u.username AS followingUsername, u.profile_picture AS followingProfilePicture FROM follow f INNER JOIN users u ON f.following_id = u.id WHERE f.follower_id = #{userId}
